statements: SELECT company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_call_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM earnings_call_sentiment WHERE company_name LIKE 'Apple%';
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_sentiment_score FROM earnings_call_sentiment;
SELECT company_name, transcript_date FROM earnings_call_sentiment ORDER BY transcript_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM earnings_call_sentiment WHERE company_name = 'Microsoft';
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_call_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, transcript_date FROM earnings_call_sentiment WHERE company_name LIKE 'Apple%' ORDER BY transcript_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment, company_name FROM earnings_call_sentiment GROUP BY company_name HAVING avg_sentiment > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_sentiment DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS num_calls FROM earnings_call_sentiment GROUP BY company_name HAVING num_calls > 5 ORDER BY num_calls DESC;
SELECT company_name, transcript_date, SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_sentiment FROM earnings_call_sentiment GROUP BY company_name, transcript_date ORDER BY total_sentiment ASC;
SELECT * FROM earnings_transcripts;
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT company_name, transcript_text FROM earnings_transcripts WHERE company_name='Apple';
SELECT * FROM earnings_transcripts ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score, transcript_text FROM earnings_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM earnings_transcripts;
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(sentiment_id) AS total_sentiments FROM investor_sentiments GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_sentiments > 5;
SELECT company_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM investor_sentiments GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY avg_score DESC;

SELECT et.company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transcripts, MAX(is.sentiment_score) AS max_sentiment FROM earnings_transcripts et JOIN investor_sentiments is ON et.company_name = is.company_name GROUP BY et.company_name HAVING total_transcripts > 3 AND max_sentiment < 0.7 ORDER BY total_transcripts DESC;
SELECT company_id, transcript_id, sentiment_score FROM company_sentiment;
SELECT transcript_id, transcript_text, transcript_date FROM transcripts;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, contact_info FROM investors;
SELECT sentiment_score, company_id, transcript_id FROM company_sentiment;
SELECT transcript_date, transcript_text, transcript_id FROM transcripts;
SELECT * FROM company_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT company_id, sentiment_score FROM company_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT transcripts.transcript_text, transcripts.transcript_date, investors.investor_name FROM transcripts JOIN investors ON transcripts.transcript_id = investors.investor_id;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_score, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM company_sentiment;
SELECT * FROM transcripts WHERE transcript_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM earnings_call_transcripts;
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_call_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score > 4.5;
SELECT transcript_text FROM earnings_call_transcripts WHERE id = 3;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_sentiment FROM analysts_reviews ORDER BY analyst_sentiment DESC;
SELECT company_name, sentiment_category FROM investor_sentiment WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM earnings_call_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score > 4.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT company_name, sentiment_score FROM earnings_call_transcripts WHERE company_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT c.company_name, COUNT(r.analyst_name) AS num_reviews FROM earnings_call_transcripts c JOIN analysts_reviews r ON c.id = r.transcript_id GROUP BY c.company_name HAVING num_reviews > 3;
SELECT cd.company_name, cd.industry, ins.sentiment_category FROM company_details cd JOIN investor_sentiment ins ON cd.company_name = ins.company_name WHERE ins.sentiment_category = 'Positive';
SELECT AVG(analyst_sentiment) AS avg_sentiment, MAX(analyst_sentiment) AS max_sentiment, MIN(analyst_sentiment) AS min_sentiment FROM analysts_reviews;
SELECT * FROM companies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transcript_text, sentiment_score FROM earnings_calls_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT investor_name, email FROM investors WHERE investor_id = '98765432-1010-1234-5678-098765432101';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE industry IN ('Technology', 'Finance') ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM earnings_calls_transcripts;
SELECT transcript_id, company_id, transcript_text FROM earnings_calls_transcripts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' AND company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT investor_name, email FROM investors WHERE investor_id IN (SELECT investor_id FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2);
SELECT transcript_id, call_date FROM earnings_call_dates WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY call_date ASC;
